医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家绘制了癌症耐药性的遗传图谱所有导致耐药性的癌症突变都属于四类之一。新研究详细介绍了每种类型，有助于发现药物开发的目标并确定潜在的有效二线疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Scientists-map-the-genic-landscape-of-drug-resistance-in-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Scientists-map-the-genic-landscape-of-drug-resistance-in-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23748eeb-89a6-40e6-85d4-68938cb97ca5 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 07:20:42 -0400 Scientists map the genetic landscape of drug resistance in cancers
经济激励在促进健康生活方式中的作用多运动、戒烟、减肥：伟大的决心，却很难坚持。但如果有经济激励作为回报，事情会变得更容易吗？根据拉德堡德大学等人的研究，它可以成为一种有效的工具，尽管仍然存在一些障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/The-role-of-financial-incentives-in-promoting-healthy-lifestyles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/The-role-of-financial-incentives-in-promoting-healthy-lifestyles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=895d10e5-0a12-4c5f-92ac-500363792195 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 07:06:50 -0400 The role of financial incentives in promoting healthy lifestyles
Helene 和 CVS 为 25,000 名依靠静脉营养生存的患者带来双重打击CVS 代表突然闯入丽莎·特朗布尔位于马萨诸塞州皮茨菲尔德伯克希尔医疗中心三楼的病房，宣布特朗布尔回家的一切都已安排妥当。她在家中依靠静脉注射营养，因为严重的肠道问题导致她无法进食。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Helene-and-CVS-land-double-whammy-for-25000-病人-who-survive-on-IV-nutrition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Helene-and-CVS-land-double-whammy-for-25000-病人-who-survive-on-IV-nutrition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a80b7d18-4d52-4c40-b872-729977253d87 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 06:56:18 -0400 Helene and CVS land double whammy for 25,000 patients who survive on IV nutrition
了解子宫内膜异位症患者的心血管风险子宫内膜异位症会增加心血管事件的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Understanding-cardioangio-risks-in-endometriosis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Understanding-cardioangio-risks-in-endometriosis- Patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d4033d4-ad0b-4cfa-a24d-b67cfa059008 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 06:47:00 -0400 Understanding cardiovascular risks in endometriosis patients
加州在分裂的选举年继续保持克制的进步政策今年，州长加文·纽瑟姆确认了堕胎权，称加州是“一个自豪的生殖自由州”，并批评全国各地的共和党人试图剥夺家庭的权利。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/California-continues-progressive-policies-with-restraint-in-divisive-election-year.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/California-continues-progressive-policies-with-restraint-in-divisive-election-year.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8ee8e62-7a55-4852-a837-6fe06b62532e Fri, 18 Oct 2024 06:45:09 -0400 California continues progressive policies, with restraint, in divisive election year
山城面临意想不到的公共卫生灾难在飓风海伦之前，如果您顺便拜访北卡罗来纳州阿什维尔的众多啤酒厂、艺术画廊或屡获殊荣的餐厅之一，并与居住在这些地区的任何人（包括我）交谈，大多数人都会告诉您他们感到非常安全免受气候灾害的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Mountain-town-confronts-an-unexpected-public-health-catastrophe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Mountain-town-confronts-an-unexpected-public-health-catastrophe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15c5d9f2-2f1e-442b-a7b3-02d1a58b60ce Fri, 18 Oct 2024 06:38:09 -0400 Mountain town confronts an unexpected public health catastrophe
新型葡萄糖敏感胰岛素 NNC2215 可以通过降低低血糖风险来改变糖尿病护理NNC2215 是一种葡萄糖敏感胰岛素，通过动态调节血糖水平来改善血糖控制，减少糖尿病护理中的低血糖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-glucose-sensitive-insulin-NNC2215-could-transform-diabetes-care-by-lowering-hypoglycemia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-glucose-sensitive-insulin-NNC2215-could-transform-diabetes-care-by-lowering-hypoglycemia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf476fa3-9b33-4688-a273-ddae18301155 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 06:29:00 -0400 New glucose-sensitive insulin NNC2215 could transform diabetes care by lowering hypoglycemia risk
研究发现大型语言模型的医疗保健评估缺乏真实的患者数据和偏见评估系统评价显示，大型语言模型的医疗保健评估中只有 5% 使用真实患者数据，凸显了偏见和任务评估方面的差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Study-finds-health-care-evaluations-of-large-language-models-lacking-in-real- Patient-data-and-bias-assessment。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Study-finds-health-care-evaluations-of-large-language-models-lacking-in-real- Patient-data-and-bias-assessment。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80f09da6-bd97-4e72-b84f-31aad0746151 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 05:54:00 -0400 Study finds health care evaluations of large language models lacking in real patient data and bias assessment
研究探讨为何青少年通过 TikTok 内容自我诊断心理健康状况在身份探索和有限的医疗保健服务的推动下，青少年在使用 TikTok 后越来越多地自我诊断心理健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Study-explores-why-teens-self-diagnose-mental-health-conditions-through-TikTok-content.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Study-explores-why-teens-self-diagnose-mental-health-conditions-through-TikTok-content.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09dacdcd-e135-42fd-bce8-7bc9041eceae Fri, 18 Oct 2024 05:15:00 -0400 Study explores why teens self-diagnose mental health conditions through TikTok content
研究发现口服避孕药可能会改变服用雄激素药的女性的血糖反应这项研究强调了雄激素避孕药的代谢影响，显示女性餐后血糖和胰岛素水平显着增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Study-finds-oral-contraceptives-may-alter-glycemic-response-in-women-using-androgenic-pills.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Study-finds-oral-contraceptives-may-alter-glycemic-response-in-women-using-androgenic-pills.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=474bc080-e879-4f27-92a9-08b6c6f7eacb Fri, 18 Oct 2024 04:48:00 -0400 Study finds oral contraceptives may alter glycemic response in women using androgenic pills
